reviews.review: Es mucho mejor de lo que creía, no solo la historia sino la realización de los puzzles, la complejidad con la que están hechos y el cuidado que les han dedicado.
Very nice puzzles i liked it
Gayet başarılı
Два друга и бешенная подруга ,11 Гладос из 5

Extremely great game for one time playthrough. At first this game will draw you in because of great dystopian atmosphere and engaging plot. Other than that there is not much do on second playthrough. 

This time all the puzzles has just one solution which mostly is guided through blatantly obvious level design and limited level interactivity. Because of this and the fact that this games biggest plus is it's storytelling the second play through won't bring any thrills from gameplay perspective. 

The first Portal is a bit better game because there is no hand holding and the story does not kick in till the very end. Which makes it feel like your story.

But Portal 2 does what not many sequels can do. It brings the twists to the story that makes it extremely fun game all the way till the end.

Simplesmente uma obra prima. Toda a história por trás do jogo, sua narrativa, os personagens, junto com a jogabilidade e os desafios do jogo estão bem ajustados em uma experiência incrível. Os gráficos além de tudo ainda se mantém atualmente e tem-se uma modo co-op muito divertido. 

Saudades da época que a Valve lançava jogos...

本作改進了不少地方
像是開在地面上的兩個傳送門間的出入會以極快的速度翻轉鏡頭
(1代是慢慢轉，而且如果轉正前就回到初來的傳送門就會再慢慢轉回去整個暈死人)
同時也看到光圈科學設備之大，超乎想像
居然有如此龐大的地下建築
劇情也十分不錯，合作模式也十分有趣，考驗搭檔玩家彼此的機智和反應
值得收藏

Fun!!

Pros:
+Rich story with a nice plot twist.
+A lot of new gameplay mechanics (gels, jump pads, lasers and laser cubes, etc.)
+Ability to create and share custom test chambers.
+Co-op multiplies everything above by two. 
+Mods, such as Portal stories:Mel or Aperture tag are incredible.
Cons:
-Most of the story is concentrated in singleayer mode and most of the stuff that we love about Portal (lovely trolling from GLaDOS and tricky puzzles) is moved to co-op.
